about.title: I am a Software Engineer.
about.description: In the meantime, I am working as a Frontend Software Engineer at VML
about.details: Mid-level frontend developer with proven 4+ years of experience in delivering high quality interactive web applications. As an organized result-driven professional with high  attention to details, I tend to reproduce satisfactory results with pixel-perfect, cleanly coded and well documented websites. I am also a good team player who learn and adapt fast always aiming for growth, skill development and building good relations.

about.title: I am a Physicist.
about.description: I used to teach Math and Physics and do some research in Physics
about.details: I have a Masters in Nuclear and Subatomic Physics after which I taught several years in different schools and institutions. I also did some Cosmology research afterwords.
